featured.text: Besides, one of his hands should bear a mark like a conch-shell.

definition.zh_def: 海螺，一種大型的海洋貝類，通常有螺旋形的外殼。
definition.en_def: A conch is a large marine mollusk with a spiral shell, often found in warm waters.
definition.example: We found a beautiful conch on the beach during our vacation.
